### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=107.5, y=-33.5)

### Iron plate mine at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Water supply system at position(x=107.5, y=-33.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=107.5, y=-33.5)
- Pipe group (fluid system 131471, fluid water, position x=107.5, y=-34.5)

### Steam supply system at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of following entities
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Pipe group (fluid system 131471, fluid water, position x=111.5, y=-33.5)
- Pipe group (fluid system 131475, fluid steam, position x=117.5, y=-34.5)

### Electricity distribution system at position(x=119.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of following entities
- Electricity group (id 575442, poles [(x=119.5, y=-30.5)], voltage 0)
- Small electric pole (position x=119.5, y=-30.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the item in your inventory before attempting to insert it into an entity.
- Check the entity's inventory to ensure it has space for the item.

### Errors when using entities without proper connections
- Ensure entities are properly connected to each other before attempting to use them.
- Check the entity's connection points to ensure they are connected to the correct entities.

### Errors when using entities without proper fuel or input
- Ensure entities have the necessary fuel or input before attempting to use them.
- Check the entity's fuel or input levels to ensure they are not empty.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
Important variables that have been assigned:
- `transport-belt`: 8
- `small-electric-pole`: 1
- `wood`: 7
- `copper-ore`: 80
- `iron-plate`: 7
- `copper-plate`: 5
- `copper-cable`: 2
- `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
